thread.title: Watch Katy Perry’s New “Chained to the Rhythm” Video
thread.title_full: Watch Katy Perry’s New “Chained to the Rhythm” Video

author: Evan Minsker and Jazz Monroe
title: Watch Katy Perry’s New “Chained to the Rhythm” Video
text:
Watch Katy Perry’s New “Chained to the Rhythm” Video Colorful clip sees Perry wandering through a magical theme park Katy Perry 
Katy Perry ’s new single “ Chained to the Rhythm ” has been getting quite the rollout. The Skip Marley-featuring song premiered via disco balls around the world, got a lyric video featuring a hamster , and then was performed for the first time at the Grammys , with Perry wearing an armband that read “PERSIST” and a Planned Parenthood button. Now, the song has an official video. It features the singer in “Oblivia,” a magical amusement park that was revealed in a George Takei-narrated teaser trailer last week. Artists In This Story
